title: torch.nn.LogSoftmax doesn't take dim argument
body_html:
I'm trying to use the torch.nn.LogSoftmax module and I want to specify the dim. I tried

ls = torch.nn.LogSoftmax(dim=1)

as indicated in the docs but got

TypeError: __init__() got an unexpected keyword argument 'dim'

I'm running pytorch version 0.2.0_4.

Thanks!
body_text:
I'm trying to use the torch.nn.LogSoftmax module and I want to specify the dim. I tried
ls = torch.nn.LogSoftmax(dim=1)

as indicated in the docs but got
TypeError: __init__() got an unexpected keyword argument 'dim'

I'm running pytorch version 0.2.0_4.
Thanks!
body:
I'm trying to use the torch.nn.LogSoftmax module and I want to specify the dim. I tried
```
ls = torch.nn.LogSoftmax(dim=1)
```
as indicated in the [docs](http://pytorch.org/docs/master/nn.html?highlight=nllloss#torch.nn.LogSoftmax) but got
```
TypeError: __init__() got an unexpected keyword argument 'dim'
```
I'm running pytorch version 0.2.0_4.

Thanks!
